content: this is a legal case that was filed in the municipal court split it involves the dissolution of coownership of a property the case started in october 2006 and lasted for 10 years and 5 months the final resolution was the sale of the property through a public auction and the distribution of the obtained value among the coowners the court used the property act of october 20 2006 to make its decision the plaintiffs presented various pieces of evidence including inheritance resolutions expert examinations and witness testimonies the court ordered the dissolution of the coownership in a specific manner as it was not possible to divide the property geometrically the parties could not reach an agreement so the court ordered the civil division of the coownership
